description: While in the step to add media (photo, videos and text), there is a button for ‘Settings’ in the right corner of the menu bar. Click on it and change your preferences. Hit the ‘save’ button to restore the changes.
description_text: While in the step to add media (photo, videos and text), there is a button for ‘Settings’ in the right corner of the menu bar. Click on it and change your preferences. Hit the ‘save’ button to restore the changes.
title: Where can I define the slide duration?
